name: Blackbird - Nest Connecticut - GordoÂ
additionalNotes: The Blackbird Nest Connecticut has sweet notes of coffee, cream, honey, and a kick of pepper that makes this cigar enjoyable to smoke any time of the day. This hand-rolled cigar features an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper, a Sumatra Binder, and a blend of short fillers from Nicaragua, Pennsylvania, and the Dominican Republic.
